name: Missing Winter
description:
Missing Winter is a walking simulator where you get to travel inside a snow globe.

Walk around and go on a cozy adventure as you reminisce on past memories of the winter season.

My goal is to create a relaxing open world environment for the player.

I hope to emulate and invoke  comforting feelings in my walking simulation of a snow globe that brings people comfort and memories of holidays and the warmth they bring.

Player Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Spacebar to jump

*Assets used are not my own*

Enjoy the game and let me know your thoughts !! 

Thank you!!
